title: Couple With Heart: Man, Person, Light Skin Tone
alsoKnownAs: Couple With Heart: Man, Person, Light Skin Tone
description: A couple composed of a man and a person, with a heart between them, and specified with light skin tones. Represents romantic love and partnership.
apple_vendor_description: The couple with heart emoji, featuring a man and a person with no skin tone specified with a heart above them, is rendered on Apple devices with a tender and loving embrace. Apple's design emphasizes soft, rounded shapes and gentle gradients, creating a warm and inviting visual. The prominent heart, glowing with Apple's signature glossy finish, symbolizes deep affection and connection between the two figures, making it an ideal choice for expressing love, partnership, and strong emotional bonds in digital communication.
